content.speaker: Evan
content.text: Bowser, you must let all the children go free!
content.text_en: Bowser, you must let all the children go free!

content.speaker: Bowser
content.text: חֲלִילָה! Never! You children will keep working for me forever!
content.text_en: Absolutely not! Never! You children will keep working for me forever!

content.speaker: Isaac
content.text: But the plagues are supposed to make Bowser let us go!
content.text_en: But the plagues are supposed to make Bowser let us go!

content.speaker: Aurelia
content.text: הָיָה לָךְ זֶה קָשֶׁה לְהָבִין? The plagues aren't working!
content.text_en: Was that hard for you to understand? The plagues aren't working!

content.speaker: narrator
content.text: But then Shenzi the dog came to hug Aaron and make him happy again.
content.text_en: But then Shenzi the dog came to hug Aaron and make him happy again.

content.speaker: narrator
content.text: Suddenly, all the water in Bowser's castle turned into sticky chocolate milk!
content.text_en: Suddenly, all the water in Bowser's castle turned into sticky chocolate milk!

content.speaker: Bowser
content.text_en: What is this?! What is happening?!

content.speaker: narrator
content.text: Then thousands of rubber ducks appeared all over the castle, making loud squeaking noises!
content.text_en: Then thousands of rubber ducks appeared all over the castle, making loud squeaking noises!

content.speaker: Isaac
content.text: צָרִיךְ לִלְכֹּת לְבֵית הַשִׁיחָה! I have to go to the bathroom!
content.text_en: I have to go to the bathroom!

content.speaker: narrator
content.text: Isaac ran out of the room to the bathroom, then quickly returned to continue watching the plagues.
content.text_en: Isaac ran out of the room to the bathroom, then quickly returned to continue watching the plagues.

content.speaker: Evan
content.text: We shouldn't fight. We should love each other.
content.text_en: We shouldn't fight. We should love each other.

content.speaker: narrator
content.text: The children all apologized and hugged, ready to continue facing the strange plagues together.
content.text_en: The children all apologized and hugged, ready to continue facing the strange plagues together.
